value:
$nMPID_ノート味方|Seeing so many beautiful Heroes
all in one place is a perfect way to
begin the new year.

$nMPID_ノート味方|In Jötunheimr, our New Year's
tradition is to hold a tournament
in the queen's honor.$k$pI win every year.

$nMPID_比翼ダグ|There's so much delicious food at
Askr's New Year's festival, I'm glad
I can loosen the waist on this thing!

$nMPID_比翼ダグ|So, Sis, when should I expect my
New Year's gift? Don't tell me you
suddenly forgot you're the eldest...$k$pIt's the tradition around here to give
your younger siblings gifts, you know!

$nMPID_ノート味方|I've grown rather fond of this kimono.
The styling was done so well, it even
makes Dagr look civilized for once.

We're here with greetings and
a New Year's gift from your
friend $Nf.

$nMPID_比翼ダグ|Wow! At this rate, odds are I'll be
three times as tall by the end of
the year!

$nMPID_ノート味方|Winning a battle is the proper way
to begin any year. I will dispose of
any who stand in our path.

$nMPID_ノート味方|Something seems to be throwing me
off my rhythm... Could it be these
unfamiliar clothes perhaps?

$nMPID_ノート味方|What's this? A New Year's gift from
the summoner! You have chosen the
recipient well. Just wait and see.

Yes! Dagr's here, so the New Year's
celebrations can finally begin! *wink*
...Ow, Sis, knock it o—oh, right!$k$pThis is my sister. Her name's Nótt.
She's here too.

$nMPID_ノート味方|Just how long are you planning on
enjoying the festivities, Dagr? We're
missing valuable training time.$k$p$nMPID_比翼ダグ|What? There's still food I want to try
and other fun stuff to do!$k$p$nMPID_ノート味方|Askr's foes do not rest just because
there's a festival here. We are only
falling behind.$k$p$nMPID_比翼ダグ|...I'm sure you'll overcompensate
and train extra hard to make up for
me enjoying myself a little.$k$p$nMPID_ノート味方|...The time I would have to spend
training just to pick up your existing
slack is already an eternity, Dagr!$k$p$nMPID_比翼ダグ|*sigh* So we're doing this whole
thing again this year too, huh?
Just remember you asked for it...
でえいっ
New year!
きゃああっ
Oww...
My kimono...
$nMPID_二人|Happy New Year!
$nMPID_二人|Sis! Right here, Dagr.
$nMPID_比翼ダグ|Keep it comin'!
$nMPID_ノート味方|To proper beginnings!
Seems like...a bad sign...
Failure is not an option.
Now is the time!
Got somethin' for ya! Enjoy!
Off to a... Nice start!
Laugh
Wow, you look amazing in that kimono! I know you only say that because we're twins...
And where now?
Let's say hello!
Quite the invitation.

$nMPID_比翼ダグ|Ahh! Tasty food, Heroes partying
all over the place... Askr really knows
how to celebrate a new year!

Back home we'd just have to spar in
front of Mom. Normally New Year is
awful—for me, at least! But not here!

$nMPID_ノート味方|It's not so bad, is it? It's a time-
honored Jötunheimr tradition!

$nMPID_比翼ダグ|Well, maybe it's different if you've
never lost. Ever think of that? Plus,
you always got a gift too! ...Ugh!

$nMPID_ノート味方|To the victor go the spoils... Is it
really a gift if you've earned it?

$nMPID_比翼ダグ|Whatever. I just hate starting the year
off as the loser. Every new year feels
like a new low.

$nMPID_ノート味方|Sorry I have no comforting words
to offer you... Use those feelings as
motivation for next year, perhaps?

$nMPID_比翼ダグ|Hmph! ...You're more and more like
Mom every year. You know that?

$nMPID_ノート味方|Oh? Is that so? Well, I'm glad to hear
it, Dagr! I will be the next queen, after
all, so it is only fitting.

$nMPID_比翼ダグ|Sure, sure. But here's the thing:
When I'M queen, I won't be caught
up in all those crusty old traditions...

Don't get me wrong; being strong is
great, but what about the people who
don't want to fight all the time, huh?

$nMPID_ノート味方|What about them? Appealing to the
weak will never win you the approval
of the court nobles.

$nMPID_比翼ダグ|Hah! Like I need them! Besides,
I've got enough going on without
worrying about what they think!

I was already spending all my time
training just to get stronger, but now
I have to protect Askr too!

$nMPID_ノート味方|Hm... That is true... Perhaps we ought
to set the politics aside for the time
being, then? For the summoner?

If Askr truly needs our help, we ought
to be combining our strengths rather
than using them against one another.

$nMPID_比翼ダグ|It's about time you figured that out!
Let's get this party started already!
